articles.title: Rahul Dravid confirms KL Rahul as wicketkeeper for 1st Test vs South Africa - Hindustan Times
articles.description: KL Rahul is set to don the wicketkeeping gloves in the first Test of the series against South Africa. | Cricket
articles.content: Team India will return to action in the longest format of the game for the first time since July earlier this year when they face South Africa on December 26. Chasing their first-ever Test series win… [+2264 chars]
